useCase.name: Deliver item to a specific location
useCase.description: UAV(s) are dispatched to deliver an item to a target location.

preconditions.precondition: UAVs are able to carry required payload

successEndConditions.condition: The item is successfully delivered to the intended target

failureEndConditions.condition: The UAV fails to reach the target coordinates
The UAV reaches the target coordinates but drops the item incorrectly (e.g., on top of a victim, in an unreachable location)

useCase.trigger: The UAV receives a command to deliver an item

mainSequence.step: The delivery UAVs are activated and armed.
The Drone Commander selects target GPS coordinates from a map.
The DroneResponse commander issues a command to start the delivery mission.
The UAV flies to the target destination.
The UAV establishes a safe flying altitude and sets its target destination to its home coordinates, then flies to the target destination.
Once the UAV arrives at its home coordinates, it lands.

asteps.step: Instead of the operator entering GPS coordinates, the coordinates are generated by a UAV based on its onboard vision.
Instead of flying home, the operator provides coordinates for an alternate safe landing location in the vicinity of the delivery.

esteps.description: Instead of using a map, the operator manually enters GPS coordinates.
esteps.step: The use case continues with step 3.
